description: Adds to or modifies the tags of the given resource. Tags are metadata that can be used to manage a resource.

parameters.name: resourceArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource you want to add tags to.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: The tags you want to modify or add to the resource. (dict) --- A tag is a key-value pair that is used to manage the resource. The tag's key. The tag's value.
